name: Eschew Materials
text: You can cast many spells without needing to utilize minor material components.
benefit: You can cast any spell with a material component costing 1 gp or less without needing that component. The casting of the spell still provokes attacks of opportunity as normal. If the spell requires a material component that costs more than 1 gp, you must have the material component on hand to cast the spell, as normal.
mythicText: You can cast even the most powerful spells without using material components.
mythicBenefit: You can cast any spell with a material component costing 10 gp per tier or less without providing that component. If you expend one use of mythic power while casting a spell that requires a material component costing 50 gp per tier or less, you can cast it without providing that component. Expending two uses of mythic power instead allows you to cast a spell that requires a material component costing 100 gp per tier or less without providing that component.
text_zh: 你施展法术不需低级的法术材料成分。
benefit_zh: 若欲施展的法术其材料价格不高于1gp，你不需耗用材料亦可施法。但施法依旧会引发借机攻击。若欲施展的法术其材料价格高于1金币，则你需要按照一般规则持有材料成分才能施法。
mythicText_zh: 你能够在没有材料成分的情况下施放法术，即便是最为强大的法术也是如此。
mythicBenefit_zh: 你能够施放任何材料成分的价值为每阶层10gp或更低的法术，而不需要提供该成分。若你花费1次神话之力，则可以在不提供材料成分的前提下，施放材料成分价值最高为每阶层50gp的法术。若你花费2次神话之力，则可以施放材料成分价值最高为每阶层100gp的法术而不用实际提供材料。
